item.title: Installing OCM CLI
item.description: Homebrew # To install the OCM CLI you can download binaries for major platforms from the GitHub releases page. You can also install via homebrew for macOS and Linux: brew install open-component-model/tap/ocm Bash # To install with bash for macOS or Linux execute the following command: curl -s https://ocm.software/install.sh | sudo bash Building from source # Prerequisites # git make golang Installation Process # Clone the open-component-model/ocm repo: git clone https://github.
